name: Daggers in the Dark
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, choose and kill an attacking character. The attacking player may sacrifice 2 characters to cancel this effect.

name: Red Ronnet
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Red Ronnet is attacking, if the defending player controls a card in shadows, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

name: Banished from the Light
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, choose a character. Place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

flavor: "The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy."
name: Cersei Lannister
text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows during the challenges phase, each opponent discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

name: Underhand Methods
text:
Shadow (0).
Attached character gets +1 STR for each card you control in shadows.

flavor: "There are no gods but R'hllor and the Other, whose name must not be said."
name: Moqorro
text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After Moqorro comes out of shadows during a challenge, choose a defending character and place it on top of its owner's deck.

flavor: "This was not done from malice. It was for the realm. For the children."
name: Varys
text: Shadow (8). Stealth. Reduce the cost to bring Varys out of shadows by 1 for each other card in shadows. Reaction: After Varys comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character with power.
